member.name: N:Org.Sdmxsource.Sdmx.Api
member.summary: The SdmxAPI defines high level SDMX Interfaces. These include the domain objects (SdmxObjects), retrieval managers, data writers, and data readers.

member.name: N:Org.Sdmxsource.Sdmx.SdmxObjects
member.summary: The SdmxObjects contain implementations of all the domain Objects as defined in the SDMXApi module. The Mutable objects are also in the module

member.name: N:Org.Sdmxsource.Sdmx.StructureRetrieval
member.summary: This module provides implementation classes for interfaces which define methods for retrieving Sdmx Structures and Registrations.

member.name: N:Org.Sdmxsource.Sdmx.Structureparser
member.summary: The structure parser provides functionality to validate and build SdmxObjects from SDMX-ML messages. The structure parser can also write SDMX-ML from SdmxObjects. The Structure parser offers the ability to resolve cross references, and externally referenced structures.

member.name: N:Org.Sdmxsource.Sdmx.Util
member.summary: This namespace contains various helper classes specific to SDMX

member.name: N:Org.Sdmxsource.Util
member.summary: This namespace contains various helper classes

member.name: N:Org.Sdmxsource.XmlHelper
member.summary: This namespace contains various helper classes for creating XmlReader, parsing and retrieving embeded .xsd files.

member.name: N:Estat.Sri.SdmxEdiDataWriter
member.summary: The SdmxEdiDataWriter writes EDI (GESMES/TS) data messages using the .

member.name: N:Estat.Sri.SdmxDataParser
member.summary: The SdmxDataParser writes SDMX-ML data messages in SDMX v2.0 and SDMX v2.1 formats including Compact, StructureSpecific, CrossSectional and Generic.

member.name: N:Estat.Sri.SdmxStructureMutableParser
member.summary:
The SdmxStructureMutableParser provides functionality to build SdmxObjects (and mutable objects) from SDMX-ML messages. The structure parser can also write SDMX-ML from SdmxObjects and mutable objects. Unlike the StructureParser it does not use a XML binding technology but uses XmlReader for reading and XmlWriter for writing and as a result is faster but covers only a subset of SDMX v2.0.
Only the following structures are supported: - Category Schemes - Codelists - Concept schemes - Dataflows - Hierarchical Codelists - KeyFamilies (DSD)

member.name: N:Estat.Sri.SdmxParseBase
member.summary: This package provides base and helper classes for SdmxDataParser and SdmxStructureMutableParser

member.name: N:Estat.Sri.SdmxXmlConstants
member.summary: This package provides constants and auto-generated enumerations of elements and attributes used in SDMX v1.0, v2.0 and v2.1. It is used in SdmxDataParser and SdmxStructureMutableParser
